alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 4:51AM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY BELOW 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected below 6500 feet. * WHERE....Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau, Western Mogollon Rim, Eastern Mogollon Rim, White Mountains and the Black Mesa Area below 6500 feet. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds will move loose debris and may damage trees and cause spotty power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow above 5500-6000 feet is likely from late Tuesday night into Wednesday morning. These conditions will result in periods of significantly reduced visibility on roads and hazardous travel in this time period.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains
